docs.text:
What is Anysols?


Sleek and powerful platform for faster and easier application development. Anysols empowers developers to build applications that live on the web platform.




Quick start


Install the latest version of Anysols globally with 
npm
:


npm install -g anysols




Create a new project:


mkdir new-project
new-project
anysols setup




Run the project


anysols run
docs.title: What is Anysols?

docs.title: Quick start

docs.text:
Getting Started


Installation


Installing Anysols platform


Before installing Anysols platform, you need to make sure you have NodeJS and npm – the Node package manager – up and running. You can verify if you're already good to go with the following commands:


node --version
# v8.11.3
npm --version
# 5.6.0
